data.eml:eml: New species of Chimerothalassius Shamshev & Grootaert (Diptera: Dolichopodidae: Parathalassiinae) from the West Indies and Costa Rica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brooks, Scott E., Cumming, Jeffrey M. (2018): New species of Chimerothalassius Shamshev & Grootaert (Diptera: Dolichopodidae: Parathalassiinae) from the West Indies and Costa Rica. Zootaxa 4387 (3): 511-523, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4387.3.6
